properties.Name: PartyCurrencyUsage
properties.Description:
The Currency(s) and currency usage(s) that the party identifies or are identified as appropriate for various transactions or usage.

Ex:

- Statements/US dollars
- Invoice/US dollars
- ADR Equity Investments/Euros/Primary Preference
- ADR Equity Investments/US dollars/Alternate Preference

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: CurrencyUsageId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Currency Usage.

Columns.Name: PreferenceId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Preference.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period start timestamp that the information is valid or effective as of.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period end timestamp that the information is valid or effective as of.

Columns.Name: IsoCurrencyCode
Columns.Description:
The ISO 4217 currency code.

Ex:
Currency Code = AED
Currency Name = Dirham
Country Name = United Arab Emirates

Columns.Name: PartyCurrencyUsageNote
Columns.Description: Notes or additional information regarding the Party Currency Usage and preferences.
